list_definition.definition: the part of a plant that grows upward from the root, or the part from which a leaf, flower or fruit grows; a stalk

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Poppies have long, hairy, twisting stems.

list_definition.definition: the narrow part of various objects, eg of a wine-glass between the bowl and the base

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: the stem of a wine-glass / of a tobacco-pipe.

list_definition.definition: the upright piece of wood or metal at the bow of a ship

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: As the ship struck the rock, she shook from stem to stern.

list_definition.definition: to stop (a flow, eg of blood)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She used a bandage to stem the flow of blood from the wound.
